com.kontakt.sdk.android.connection

Class SyncableKontaktDeviceConnection.SyncWriteBatchListener<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.kontakt.sdk.android.connection.SyncableKontaktDeviceConnection.SyncWriteBatchListener<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - Batch holder type
    Enclosing class:
    SyncableKontaktDeviceConnection

    public abstract static class SyncableKontaktDeviceConnection.SyncWriteBatchListener<T>
extends Object

    Abstract class used as listener to notify about batch updating device and syncing with REST API

    Current implementation does nothing

      • onBatchWriteError

        public void onBatchWriteError(int errorCode)
        Informs that an error has occured during batch write operation. Once the callback method is launched the rollback operation is performed aiming at restoring original configuration to Beacon device.
        Parameters:
        errorCode - the error code

      • onSyncFailed

        public void onSyncFailed(com.kontakt.sdk.android.http.exception.ClientException e)

        Invoked when beacon batch characteristics manipulation was success, but invoking REST API failed

        No attempts to restore beacon old characteristics will be done

        Parameters:
        e - the e

      • onSuccess

        public void onSuccess(T batchHolder)

        Invoked when beacon batch characteristics manipulation was success and invoking REST API succeed

        Parameters:
        batchHolder - the batch holder
